About Me

My name's Stuart. I am a vastly experienced, focussed software engineer using the Microsoft stack, with previous involvement on a wide range of projects for a multitude of different clients. I always bring my passion for learning new technologies and am always looking for new ways to apply them to the current situation. I use my full range of skills to deliver well coded, highly maintainable solutions to deadlines and budget.
